title: Leagues current state`
body:
summoners rift is a legit glorified aram. Last 10 games 25-50 deaths by 20 MINS. Either the item damage needs to be REMOVED or Rune proc damage needs to be REMOVED. No talent. No skill. No cordination. Just plow yourself into the enemy team as fast as you can. Until the winner is decided at 15 mins.
Coming from a dude with 5k games. Hard stuck plat for 6 seasons. I can say this is by far the worst state the game has ever been in.
